text: @realDonaldTrump Since when do you have ANY African-American friends? If you did have one, you've lost em now. This past 3 weeks of protests have been a disaster for you! YOU LOST the BLACK VOTE for sure. BTW - THE CORONAVIRUS HAS NOT GONE AWAY, SO WHY ARE YOU OUT-TO-LUNCH ON THIS CRITICAL ISSUE?
